Text: A-V=10 thanks bone, been looking for a good copy with subs.
thanks Bone!! much love. A/V=10...as always
sorry, cant tell yet but think i double posted... (Bone's so nice i thanked him twice:)

I know the movie came with both mandarin and Cantonese audio, haven't watched THIS one yet, but more than happy to report back and say which language.  

There are other uploads that allow the choice and SUBS are also 'included' but damn it, hard coded subs are just EASY!!   I always try to look for embedded subs, if I can.  Sometimes it's just too many problems ripping it to a DVD cause my memory stick won't play subs on the player!!

Thanks BONE! Great Size/Quality ratio.
